fields.name: Cape Town Conference Centre
fields.description: A state-of-the-art conference venue in the heart of Cape Town, ideal for events, exhibitions, and corporate meetings.

fields.name: Johannesburg Country Estate
fields.description: A serene estate surrounded by nature, perfect for retreats, weddings, and executive getaways.

fields.name: Stellenbosch Town Hall
fields.description: Historic town hall venue with modern amenities, ideal for community gatherings and small-scale conferences.

fields.name: Creative Coding Bootcamp
fields.description: An immersive 8-week program focused on web and mobile development skills for all ages.

fields.name: Business Leadership Academy
fields.description: A weekend school designed to empower future leaders with entrepreneurial skills and practical business insights.

fields.title: About Debaren
fields.description: Debaren is South Africa’s premier platform for discovering inspiring venues, creative pop-up spaces, and WiFi-friendly locations. Whether you’re planning a conference, an art show, or a remote work session, our curated spaces blend innovation and hospitality. Our mission is to connect people with the perfect space for every occasion, making every gathering exceptional.
